snippet.title: Spies & Soldiers - Coming Soon
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1094450
Spies & Soldiers is a fast paced strategy game that plays out across beautiful watercolor maps of your unique kingdom. The game is a two-player, turn-based digital board game, based on simple mechanics from which complex strategies arise. Each match has a randomly generated world map, so every game is different.

Seize control of castles and cities as your empire expands across each new world, but be sure to keep in mind the balance of power as things can change quickly from one moment to the next.
